sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Dakrua basilika. That is, the princly teares of Elisabetha, Queen of Bohemia: ouer the death, of her eldest sonne, Fridericus Henricus: Count Palatijn: Duke of Bavaria. / Written by Daniel Souterius: minister of the word of God, at Haerlem. Souterius, Daniel.
[297] p.
Printed by Harman Cranepoel, in the green cross., [Haarlem] : 1629..
Initial. Each language version (English, French, Dutch, Latin) has special t.p. and separate register. Signatures: A-B¹² A-D¹² A-D¹² E⁶ A¹² B¹⁰. Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
=======
